content.name: Introduction
content.content: Welcome to this sample United States History textbook created for the Tome app in order to compete in the Congressional App Challenge. While this textbook may not currently be very useful to student trying to learn the subject, it will become more helpful as more content is added. The digital format allows this textbook to have many additional features not possible in print. Some of these features include: tags, themes, progress bars, zoomable images, quick jumping between sections, and more.
content.detail: This first paragraph has undergone many revisions over the course of the development of this app in order to test out different features as they were implemented, including the feature you are using to read this!
